amendment.description: Amendment sought to redirect $300,000 within the National Park Service Operations account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 241 (Roll no. 418).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Himes amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 183 - 241 (Roll no. 418).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Himes.
